1.title: Everything to know about bloggin and starting your own blog
1.description: Lorem hello world, in the mask of things not happening , thi sis what you have to do in order to survive
1.name: Odoemena Augustine Chinonso
requirements: Access to a computer with an internet connection
what you will learn: Learn advanced Python features, like the collections module and how to work with timestamps
Understand complex topics, like decorators
Learn to use Object Oriented Programming with classes!
Build a complete understanding from the ground up!
